sections.description: Summarizes the current and future fleet composition, including owned, leased, and required chassis.  Provides key inputs for the financial model.
sections.notes: Includes current EVG fleet and future fleet requirements.  'Short/(Surpl)' represents the difference between the fleet required and the current fleet.

sections.description: Details the utilization and cost per usage day for the fleet.  Used to estimate revenue and expenses based on fleet activity.
sections.notes: Provides estimates for utilization and cost per usage day, which are key drivers of the financial model.

sections.description: Summarizes the upfront investment and financial returns associated with the deal.  Includes key metrics such as revenue, expenses, EBITDA, and IRR.
sections.notes: Provides an overview of the investment required and the expected financial returns.  Includes commentary on key assumptions.

sections.description: Details the financial returns for Year 1, including revenue, expenses, EBITDA, and key assumptions.  Used to evaluate the profitability of the deal.
sections.notes: Focuses on the financial performance in Year 1. Includes commentary on key revenue and expense assumptions.

sections.description: Presents key financial return metrics such as Purchase Multiple, Depreciated Value IRR, TEV 5x Exit Multiple IRR, and NPV.  Used to assess the overall attractiveness of the investment.
sections.notes: Calculates key return metrics based on a 10-year projection. Includes commentary on the assumptions used.

sections.description: Analyzes the sensitivity of key model outputs to changes in model inputs.  Used to understand the key drivers of the financial model and identify potential risks.
key_components: Lease Cost per Day to EVG
Average EBITDA per chassis per day
sections.notes: Examines the impact of changes in key assumptions on the model's outputs.  Helps to identify the most important drivers of the deal's profitability.

sections.description: Analyzes the impact of changes in CH Rate and Purchase Price on key model outputs.
sections.notes: Examines the impact of changes in CH Rate and Purchase Price on the model's outputs.
